sections.description: Defines the assumptions related to chassis utilization, leasing, and scraping.  It allows users to input values for various scenarios related to chassis management.
key_components: Total Chassis Required for EVG Use
sections.notes: Input table for chassis utilization assumptions.

sections.description: Defines the assumptions related to the purchase and lease of chassis, including book value, premiums/discounts, and lease costs. This section allows users to input values for various cost components.
key_components: Lease Cost per Day for EVG Chassis
Lease Cost per Day for EVG Leases
Lease Cost per Day for Add. Capacity
sections.notes: Input table for purchase and lease assumptions.

sections.description: Defines the assumptions related to upfront investment costs, including repositioning, decoupling, reconditioning, retitling, stenciling, and offhire costs. This section allows users to input values for various cost components.
sections.notes: Input table for upfront investment assumptions.

sections.description: Defines the operating assumptions, including terminal percentage, terminal billing threshold, and cost assumptions for M&R, Admin, Repo, and Other costs.
